attributes.action: Enforce transparency of Pharmaceutical companys findings relating to testing of products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is important that people are made aware of the decisions Pharmaceutical companies make in relation to their research. I.e. Just how effective a product is, what the risks really are, and if the product was dropped because it was deemed far too effective (not profit worthy).

We request that you challenge the way that they have the freedom to gloss over, glamourise and bare faced lie about their products.
